Sequence Information.Function: Thionins are small plant proteins which are toxic to animal cells. They seem to exert their toxic effect at the level of the cell membrane. Their precise function is not known.

Literature.Title: Cloning and nucleotide sequence of a cDNA encoding the precursor of the barley toxin alpha-hordothionin.
Literature.Author: Carbonero P.,Garcia-Olmedo F.,Hernandez-Lucas C.,Paz-Ares J.,Ponz F.
